p: The total RNA from S. calendulacea and S. trilobata was extracted by TRIzol reagent (Promega). The RNA quality of the samples was determined by UV spectrophotometry and agarose gel electrophoresis; the OD 260/280 and OD 260/230 absorbance ratio were used to evaluate RNA purity, and RNA integrit was confirmed by 1% agarose gel electrophoresis. Samples with poor quality were re-extracted.
